1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-centrik
1.0.0.description: Simple, Quaky, Functional And Adaptable Blog Centric Theme!. Content/widget driven layouts for that quaky look with no complicated options/settings leaving you to concentrate on content. Different sidebars for Pages, blog feed and single posts plus top showcase widget area and widgetized footer area with custom recent posts and recent comments widgets.
